oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from John Bridges to Professor W. J. Jones
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from the building at 712 College Street, once the parsonage for Andrew College in Trenton. Letter to friend and Professor W. [J.] Jones from John C. [Bridges]. Bridges discusses deaths from the previous week, church services that the college held, the Campbellites evangelical events, and Confederate families leaving town. Andrews College was founded in 1852 as a Methodist/Episcopal college and closed in 1871. The property was purchased in 1875 for Peabody High School.
